faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I add AlphaLLM to my Discord server?
faq.a1: Click the "Add to Discord" button on our homepage and follow the instructions.
faq.a2: The main commands are /chat for conversation, /image for generating images, and /help to get assistance.
faq.q3: Is the bot free to use?
faq.a3: Yes, AlphaLLM offers a free plan with basic features. Premium plans are available for more features.
faq.q4: How do I change the bot's language?
faq.a4: Use the /settings language command to change the bot's language in your server.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Couldn't find what you were looking for? Send us a message.

intellectual.title: Intellectual property
intellectual.content: All content on the alphallm.tech site (images, texts, logos, icons, source code, etc.) is the exclusive property of YoannDev90 and is protected by French and international intellectual property laws.

liability.title: Limitation of liability
liability.content: YoannDev90 strives to ensure as best as possible the accuracy and updating of information published on this site, and reserves the right to correct the content at any time and without notice. However, YoannDev90 cannot guarantee the accuracy, precision, or exhaustiveness of the information made available on this site. Consequently, YoannDev90 declines all responsibility:

list.item1: for any inaccuracy, inexactitude or omission regarding information available on the site;
list.item2: for any damage resulting from a fraudulent intrusion by a third party leading to a modification of information made available on the site;
list.item3: and more generally, for any direct or indirect damages, whatever their causes, origins, nature or consequences, caused by anyone's access to the site or the impossibility of accessing it.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of terms
acceptance.content: By using the AlphaLLM Discord bot, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: Description of services
services.content: AlphaLLM is a Discord bot with functionalities including but not limited to conversational AI, image generation, and various utility commands. The services may be updated, modified, or enhanced at any time.

usage.title: Acceptable usage
usage.content: You agree not to use AlphaLLM for :

list.item2: Harass, abuse or harm other people
list.item3: Spread harmful, defamatory, obscene or otherwise objectionable content
list.item4: Generate or distribute content that infringes copyright or intellectual property
list.item5: Attempt to manipulate or circumvent service limitations
list.item6: Deliberately overload the bot or server

content.title: Generated content
content.content: All text and images generated by AlphaLLM are provided 'as is' without any warranties. While we strive to prevent the generation of harmful or offensive content, we cannot guarantee that all generated content will be appropriate or accurate. You retain responsibility for reviewing and moderating AI-generated content used in your Discord server.

modifications.title: Modifications to services
modifications.content: YoannDev90 reserves the right, at any time and without notice, to modify, suspend or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the services (or any part thereof). You agree that YoannDev90 shall not be liable to you or to any third party for any modification, suspension or discontinuance of the services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: YoannDev90 may, at its sole discretion, terminate your access to the AlphaLLM bot for violations of these terms, abusive behavior, or for any other reason deemed appropriate. Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease.

collection.title: Information collection
collection.content: AlphaLLM collects and processes the following types of information...

list.item1: Discord Usage Data: Server ID, user ID, username, content of messages sent to the bot
list.item2: Conversation History: Messages sent to the bot and generated responses
list.item3: Configuration Data: Bot configuration preferences set by server administrators
list.item4: Technical Data: Browser type, pages visited

usage.title: Use of information
usage.content: We use the collected information to...

list.item5: Analyze bot usage and improve its performance

sharing.title: Information sharing
sharing.content: AlphaLLM does not sell, trade, or transfer your personal information...

list.item2: To process your request (for example, when integrating with other services)
list.item3: To comply with the law, regulations or legal proceedings
list.item4: To protect our rights, property or safety
list.item5: With service providers who help us operate our service (under strict confidentiality obligations)

retention.title: Data retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary...

list.item1: to provide you with our services
list.item2: to comply with our legal obligations
list.item5: Conversation history may be retained for up to 30 days unless explicitly deleted by server administrators.

security.title: Data security
security.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures...

list.item1: to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration
list.item2: Despite our efforts, no internet transmission or electronic storage method is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.content: In accordance with applicable data protection laws...
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us at: yoanndev@outlook.fr

errorPage.title: Error 404
